creator: ljanda@checkstop.com
text:
and also the optimize can cause problems in the debug mode.

/bin/ksh /u/leroy/httpd-2.0.54/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile gcc -
g -O2   -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DSCO5 -D_REENTRANT   -I../include -
I../include/arch/unix  -c apr_cpystrn.c && touch apr_cpystrn.lo

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
All code should be built with -g by default, that's expected.  You can run
"strip" on the installed binary if you want stripped binaries.
